content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Hey! I'm doing good, how about you?
I'm doing well too. I just got back from a trip to the farm with my family.
Oh, that sounds fun! I love animals. What did you do there?
We got to see a lot of baby animals, like pigs, cows, chickens, and sheep. It was so cute!
That sounds amazing! I bet you had a lot of fun.
I did! I also got some really cute pictures of the animals.
I would love to see them! Do you have any social media where you post pictures?
I do, I'm on Instagram and Twitter.
Great! I'll follow you on both.
Awesome! I'll follow you back.
Thanks! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to watch movies, ride my bike, and spend time with my pets.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love movies too. What are some of your favorite movies?
I love a lot of different types of movies, but my favorites are probably the Marvel movies and the Star Wars movies.
I love the Marvel movies too! I'm not really into Star Wars, but I can appreciate it.
Yeah, they're a lot of fun.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a welding instructor at a community college.
Oh, that sounds interesting! What made you want to become a welding instructor?
I've always been interested in welding, and I love teaching people new things.
That's great! I'm sure you're a great instructor.
Thank you! I try my best.
So, what are your plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
Well, I'm sure you'll figure it out. You seem like a smart and capable person.
Thank you! I appreciate that
